step_02.name: Search and Filter Application
step_02.goal: The agent inputs the required search criteria into the appropriate fields on the website.

entries.query: Find rentals in Bristol on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/'. Return the URL of the search results page as your answer.

Look at the filters available on 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/property/manchester/' and set a price range of £1,000 to £2,000 per month. Return the URL of the search results page as your answer.
Filter for furnished apartments in Denver on Craigslist ('https://denver.craigslist.org/search/apa'). Return the URL of the search results page as your answer.
Navigate to 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/bristol/' and adjust the search settings to show only listings that allow pets. Return the URL of the search results page as your answer.

Look at the filters available on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/manchester/' and set a price range of £1,000 to £2,000 per month. Return the URL of the search results page as your answer.

step_03.name: Interaction with Web Elements:
step_03.goal: The agent interacts with dynamic elements on the page, such as search buttons and filters, to execute and refine the search.

entries.query: Find properties to rent in Leeds on 'https://www.rightmove.co.uk/'. If asked to, accept all cookies.
Find properties to rent in Liverpool on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/'. If asked to, accept all cookies. Provide the URL of the search results page.
Go to 'https://www.hollandresidential.com/co/denver/cadence/'. In the menu, navigate to 'Floor Plans' and filter for 2 beds. Give the names of the available units.
Find 2 bedroom apartments on 'https://www.hollandresidential.com/co/denver/cadence/' and provide the names of the availabele units.
Find 2 bedroom apartments on 'https://www.3300tamarac.com/?rcstdid=MzM=-dkCsfkCKtXI=' and provide the names of the available units.

step_04.name: Result Extraction
step_04.goal: Structured data from the search results, such as property names,prices, and basic attributes (e.g., number of bedrooms, location), is extracted.

entries.query: Extract the name, price, and number of bedrooms for the first listing currently displayed in the search results page: 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/glasgow/?view=map-list'.
Extract the name, price, and number of bedrooms for the first three listings currently displayed in the search results page: 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/glasgow/?view=map-list'.

Locate the apartment with the highest price among the currently visible listings and provide its price and address on ‘https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/property/glasgow/?q=Glasgow&search_source=home&view_type=grid’

Go to the second page of results (‘https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/property/glasgow/?q=Glasgow&search_source=home&view_type=grid’) and extract the price, number of bedrooms, and location for the first listing shown.

step_05.name: Detail Page Extraction:
step_05.goal: The agent navigates to individual detail pages to extract additional, more specific information, such as property descriptions or ther unstructured data not found in the search results.

entries.query: What’s the nearest station from the following property (‘https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16572798/’)?
What's the nearest tram station according to the property description ('https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16572798/')?
Find the energy efficiency rating of the second property listed on 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/property/sheffield/?q=Sheffield%2C%20South%20Yorkshire&search_source=home&view_type=grid'.
Describe the listing on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16592214/' with the following features: address, property type, number of bedrooms, size and heating.
Which is the closest outstanding school to this listing ('https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16520710/')? Provide distance and name of the school that fits best the criteria.
Which is the closest outstanding school to this listing ('https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16520710/')? Provide distance and name of the school based on the listing information.
Find out the office hours for the second property on 'https://miami.craigslist.org/search/apa#search=2~gallery~0'.
Which schools and parks are in walking distance of the listing at 'https://miami.craigslist.org/pbc/apa/d/lake-worth-convenient-full-size-washer/7827967231.html'?
Which universities are nearby the listing at 'https://miami.craigslist.org/mdc/apa/d/miami-gorgeous-2-apt-with-parking-spots/7827484222.html' according to the listing description?

step_06.name: Task Requirement Evaluation
step_06.goal: Extracted information is evaluated against the task requirements. If the details meet the criteria, they are prepared for inclusion in the results table; if not, the entry is disregarded.

entries.query: Which of the first five listings on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/norwich/?bounding-box=%7Ds%7B%60I_i%60Hx%7Be%40fbjA&view=map-list' is closest to an outstanding school? Provide distance and name of the closest school.

expected: West Earlham Infant and Nursery School

entries.query: Which of the first five listings on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/norwich/?bounding-box=%7Ds%7B%60I_i%60Hx%7Be%40fbjA&view=map-list' is closest to an outstanding school as per the websites classification? Provide distance and name of the closest school.

expected: West Earlham Infant and Nursery School

entries.query: Which of the first five listings on 'https://www.onthemarket.com/to-rent/property/norwich/?bounding-box=%7Ds%7B%60I_i%60Hx%7Be%40fbjA&view=map-list' is closest to an outstanding school as per the websites classification? Provide distance and name of the school based on the listing information.

expected: West Earlham Infant and Nursery School

entries.query: Which of the first four listings on 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/property/norwich/?q=norwich&search_source=home&view_type=grid' offers off-street parking? Provide the names of the listings.

expected: Semi-detached house to rent in George Borrow Road
Detached house to rent in Primula Drive

entries.query: Which of the first four listings on 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/property/cardiff/?q=cardiff&radius=0&results_sort=lowest_price&search_source=refine&view_type=grid' are suitable for a student? Provide the names of the listings.

expected: Room to rent in Hamilton Street
Room to rent in Harriet Street

step_07.name: Data Addition and Navigation Decision:
step_07.goal: Relevant data is added to the results table, after which the agent decides whether to continue to the next detail page (repeating steps 5 to 7) or return to the search results for further refinement (repeating steps 2 to 7).

entries.query: For the following listings, create a table with the following columns: 'Name', 'Price', 'Bedrooms', and 'Address': 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/15231397/', 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16147676/', 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/11370980/'.

For the following listings, extract 'Name', 'Price', 'Bedrooms', and 'Address': 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/15231397/', 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/16147676/', 'https://www.onthemarket.com/details/11370980/'. Provide the extracted information in a structured format.

For the following three listings, ('https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/68665774/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd', 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/69125547/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd', and 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/67139875/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd'), provide price, bedrooms, and address.

For the following three listings, ('https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/68665774/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd', 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/69125547/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd', and 'https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/67139875/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd'), provide price, bedrooms, and address as JSON.

expected: {"listings": [{"url": "https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/68665774/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd", "price": "£7,150 pcm", "bedrooms": "10 bedrooms", "address": "Forest Road, The Arboretum, Nottingham NG71"}, {"url": "https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/69125547/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd", "price": "£6,101 pcm", "bedrooms": "8 bedrooms", "address": "Peel Street, Nottingham NG1"}, {"url": "https://www.primelocation.com/to-rent/details/67139875/?search_identifier=61cdd076a9ab57ecc25003f5350b6bcd", "price": "£7,055 pcm", "bedrooms": "11 bedrooms", "address": "St James's Street, Nottingham, Nottingham NG1"}]}

entries.query: For the following overview site 'https://oregoncoast.craigslist.org/search/apa#search=2~gallery~0', provide price, bedrooms, and address of the first five listings as JSON.

expected: {"listings": [{"price": "$795", "bedrooms": "Studio", "address": "Neskowin"}, {"price": "$1,495", "bedrooms": "Studio", "address": "Not specified"}, {"price": "$1,250", "bedrooms": "Not specified", "address": "130 NE SAN BAYO CIR"}, {"price": "$1,780", "bedrooms": "3br", "address": "north bend"}, {"price": "$840", "bedrooms": "Not specified", "address": "1600 Rhododendron Dr"}]}

entries.query: For the following overview site 'https://oregoncoast.craigslist.org/search/apa#search=2~gallery~0', provide name of listing, address, price, bedrooms, parking situation and pet allowance of the first four listings as JSON.

expected: {"listings": [{"name": "Modern, furnished duplex west of Hwy 101 near beach", "address": "Rockaway Beach", "price": "$2,500", "bedrooms": "3", "parking": "no"}, {"price": "$1,495", "bedrooms": "Studio", "address": "Not specified", "name": "Ocean/Creek front studio", "parking": "off-street", "pet_allowance": "no"}, {"price": "$1,250", "bedrooms": "Not specified", "address": "130 NE SAN BAYO CIR", "name": "Large studio apartment", "parking": "off-street", "pet_allowance": "ok"}]}
